definition[0]: to obtain something, especially something that is difficult to get
example[0]: He was accused of procuring weapons for terrorists.
definition[1]: to provide a prostitute for someone
definition[2]: to obtain something that is needed for a particular task
example[1]: Companies in the industry reported difficulty in procuring raw materials.
example[2]: Investors showed faith in Path√©'s ability to procure the $900 million required to close the deal.
